definition: A universal greeting used in both formal and informal contexts.
A short-term farewell expression.
First-person singular subject pronoun.
An expression of regret or apology. 'Lemstrathma' is used for more serious offenses, while 'lemsan' is a casual version for minor social slips.
A polite phrase used to capture someone's attention, pass through a crowded space, or apologize for a minor interruption in a formal manner.
An adverb used to make a request more polite. 'Bles' is the shortened common form, while 'pozhalestonova' is the highly formal and traditional version.
Second-person singular pronoun used for addressing one individual directly. It is neutral and can be used in most social settings.
Third-person singular masculine pronoun used to refer to a male person or an entity identified as masculine.
Third-person singular feminine pronoun used to refer to a female person or an entity identified as feminine.
Third-person singular neuter pronoun used for objects, animals, or concepts that do not have a specific gender.
First-person plural pronoun representing a group that includes the speaker and at least one other person.
Third-person plural pronoun used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
Second-person plural pronoun used when addressing a group of two or more people simultaneously.
A formal title of respect and honorific used to address or refer to a person of status or a stranger in a polite way, regardless of gender.
The middle part of the body between the neck and the abdomen, specifically referring to the chest cavity in anatomical contexts.
The bony structure of the chest that encloses and protects the vital organs like the heart and lungs.
The part of the leg between the knee and the ankle; the lower limb section primarily responsible for support during movement.
The passage which leads from the back of the mouth of a person or animal to the esophagus and lungs.
A physical way of standing or a mental attitude/position on a particular issue.
The ability to see something or a particular scene or landscape that can be seen from a specific point.
A particular attitude toward or way of regarding something; a point of view that influences understanding.
A view or judgment formed about something, not necessarily based on fact or knowledge.
The position from which something or someone is observed; can be used for both physical and philosophical outlooks.
The specific and grave act of killing one's own wife.
A place on the coast where vessels may find shelter, especially one protected from rough water by piers or jetties.
The act of giving shelter or refuge to someone; or to keep a thought or feeling (typically a negative one) in one's mind.
The ability to express an idea or feeling fluently and coherently in speech or writing.
To officially assign a specified status or name to something or someone.
To express complete disapproval of; to sentence someone to a particular punishment, especially death.
A view of or attitude toward a situation or event; an opinion prompted by feeling rather than reason.
Next to or adjoining something else; sharing a common border or wall.
The conditions under which land or buildings are held or occupied; or the period of time during which an office or position is held.
To commit oneself to and begin a task or enterprise; to take on a responsibility.
The active process of accepting the consequences of one's actions or being the person in charge of a duty.
To cite or appeal to someone or something as an authority for an action or in support of an argument.
To be in the position of authority in a meeting or a court of law; to exercise control or guidance.
A sum of money granted by the government or a public body to assist an industry or business.
The hard fibrous material that forms the main substance of the trunk or branches of a tree, used for fuel or timber.
A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth; a collection of 'vunth' on a grand scale.
A thing that motivates or encourages one to do something; a reward offered for increased productivity.
The reason or reasons one has for acting or behaving in a particular way; the internal drive to achieve a goal.
The quality or state of being widespread or common in a particular area or at a particular time.
All the inhabitants of a particular town, area, or country.
A formal written request, typically one signed by many people, appealing to authority with respect to a particular cause.
Excessively proud of oneself; vain and showing an overly high opinion of one's own appearance or abilities.
Behavior showing high moral standards; a quality considered morally good or desirable in a person.
To force or oblige someone to do something through authority or necessity.
An extremely wicked or cruel act, typically one involving physical violence or injury.
The quality of being fertile; the ability to conceive children or young; or the productiveness of soil.
